title: Have you ever questioned your existence? Why does everything exist instead of nothing? - Quora

response.answer_text: Everything exist instead of nothing - Because there is a purpose. We all exist because there are purpose to fulfill. The purpose is not to carry your humanly sufferings , greed and mad chase/ rat race or possessions in the journey from birth to death but the tasks to complete in between. I have questioned my existence and have almost found the answer. What about you ?

In fact the universal cyclic existence is the proof in itself that there exists a presence otherwise it would have been a dead void existence. Inert cannot self exist as it is always in transition thus with beginning and end syndrome, neither can it exert itself into existence, as it is inert. Anyways for any evolution to occur presence is a prerequisite.

This is an article about my own existentialism crisis experience and how I eventually somehow thought my way out of it! Hopefully it helps :) Have you ever questioned your existence? Good wishes, Yee Yuen
